kpis.description: This KPI measures the proportion of revenue that remains after covering operating expenses, indicating the efficiency of the company's core business operations.

kpis.kpi: Net Income to Revenue Percent Change
kpis.description: This KPI indicates the percentage change in net income relative to revenue over a specific period, reflecting the company's profitability trend.
kpis.formula: ((Net Income Current Period - Net Income Previous Period) / Net Income Previous Period) * 100

kpis.kpi: Gross Profit from Product or Services to Revenue Product or Services
kpis.description: This KPI assesses the gross profit generated from products or services as a percentage of total revenue from those products or services, highlighting the profitability of the core offerings.
values_need_in_formula: Gross Profit from Products or Services
Total Revenue from Products or Services
kpis.formula: Gross Profit from Products or Services / Total Revenue from Products or Services

kpis.kpi: Actual Revenue to Budgeted Revenue Changes
kpis.description: This KPI compares actual revenue generated against budgeted revenue, indicating how well the company is performing relative to its financial plans.

kpis.kpi: Net Profit to Total Investment Percent
kpis.description: This KPI measures the net profit generated as a percentage of total investments, providing insight into the return on investment (ROI) for stakeholders.
